headline.main: COAST GUARD LISTS DAMAGES TO SHIPS; Reports in Detail What Italian and German Crews Did to Machinery ONE REICH CRAFT INTACT Sabotage in Most of Others Completely Disabled Engines, Boilers and Auxiliary Parts

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 1 -- The following report was made by the Coast Guard today on details of the damage done "by their own crews" to German and Italian merchant ships in American ports:
abstract: Coast Guard lists damages and seized ships in U S and P R ports
snippet: WASHINGTON, April 1 -- The following report was made by the Coast Guard today on details of the damage done "by their own crews" to German and Italian merchant ships in American ports:...

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
